messages.content: vevee
Are the Hosteeva properties family-friendly?

Yes, most Hosteeva properties are family-friendly. Hosteeva offers a variety of accommodations that cater to families, including properties with multiple bedrooms, spacious living areas, and amenities suitable for children of different ages.
Are the Hosteeva properties professionally cleaned?

Yes, Hosteeva properties undergo thorough professional cleaning to uphold a superior level of cleanliness for all guests. Hosteeva places great importance on cleanliness and hygiene, striving to create a pleasant and hygienic atmosphere that ensures guest comfort.
Are the Hosteeva properties kid-friendly?
Yes, most Hosteeva properties are kid-friendly and suitable for children of different ages.
Can I get a refund if I need to cancel my reservation?

The refund policy for Hosteeva reservations can vary depending on several factors, including the specific property, the terms and conditions of your reservation, and the timing of your cancellation. It's essential to review the cancellation policy provided at the time of booking to understand the refund options available to you.
What is the cancellation policy for Hosteeva bookings?

The cancellation policy for Hosteeva bookings can vary depending on several factors, including the specific property, the terms and conditions of your reservation, and the timing of your cancellation. It's important to review the cancellation policy provided at the time of booking to understand the specific terms and conditions that apply to your reservation.
Are there laundry facilities available at the properties?

Yes, the majority of Hosteeva properties offer laundry facilities, either within the unit or in shared/common areas. The availability of laundry facilities can vary depending on the specific property.Some properties may have a washer and dryer located within the unit itself, allowing guests to do their laundry conveniently during their stay. This is particularly common in larger properties such as houses, villas, or apartments.In other cases, Hosteeva properties may provide access to shared laundry facilities within the building or complex. These shared facilities may have coin-operated washers and dryers or may be included as a complimentary amenity for guests to use.To determine if a particular Hosteeva property has laundry facilities, you can check the property listing on the Hosteeva website or contact Hosteeva directly. The property description or amenities list should specify whether laundry facilities are available and provide more details about their location and usage.If laundry facilities are an essential requirement for your stay, it's recommended to communicate this with Hosteeva in advance or select properties with in-unit laundry facilities to ensure your needs are met.
What are some local customs or etiquette I should be aware of?

"Greeting: In New Orleans, it's common to greet people with a smile, a handshake, or a hug. It's also common to use ""ma'am"" and ""sir"" as a sign of respect.Mardi Gras: Mardi Gras is a major event in New Orleans, and it's important to be respectful of the customs and traditions associated with it. It's common to wear masks and costumes, and to participate in parades and other festivities. However, it's important to be respectful of others and avoid inappropriate behavior or excessive drinking.Food: New Orleans is famous for its cuisine, and it's important to be open to trying new foods and flavors. It's also common to share food with others, especially in social situations.Music: Music is an important part of New Orleans culture, and it's common to hear live music in restaurants, bars, and on the streets. It's important to be respectful of musicians and their performances.Hospitality: New Orleans is known for its hospitality and friendliness. It's common to engage in conversation with strangers, and to offer help or assistance to those in need.Religious and cultural customs: New Orleans has a diverse population, and it's important to be respectful of religious and cultural customs. This may include attending religious services, participating in cultural celebrations, or respecting dietary restrictions."
Are children allowed?
Children are welcomed
Are early check-ins or late check-outs allowed?
Early check-ins or late check-outs are subject to availability and need to be checked on the day of arrival or departure.
Are pets allowed?
We have pet-friendly properties in the building. You can check that information on our listing, in the property details.
Are service or emotional support animals allowed?
The service animals are allowed at no extra cost.emotional support animals are not allowed.
Are small gatherings allowed?
Any kind of gathering are not allowed as the guests are going to exceed the maximum amount of the visitors
Are there any house rules I should be aware of?

• NO SMOKING in the unit/house as well as the balcony. Any violation of the smoking policy will incur a $250.00 fine plus the cleaning costs necessary to remove smoke odors from the unit/house and/or linens.• Quiet hours are observed from 9 pm-8 am. Violators will be charged a $200 fine.• Please note: We are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, as well as stolen or damaged items that occur while on the premises, its facilities or parking lots.• Traveler must be at least 21 years of age to make a reservation.• State Identification Card or Driver License copy will be requested upon booking.• Local resident restrictions apply. Guests residing within a 100-mile radius are required to contact the host before booking.• House parties and illegal substances are strictly prohibited and grounds for immediate eviction. Violators will be charged $500 fine.• Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a $500 plus cleaning expenses. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.
Are we allowed to listen to music?
If it is not loud and the guests are following the quite hours, it is allowed.
Do you have local restrictions?
The guests who reside within 100 miles of the property should contact the host before making the reservation.
Do you have quiet hours?
Yes, quiet hours are observed from 9 pm-8 am
Is smoking allowed on the balcony?
Designated smoking areas are on the rooftop balcony & on the rooftop courtyard on the 9th floor.
Is smoking allowed?
No, it's not allowed. The property is non-smoking throughout.
What is the policy for extra guests or visitors?

"Gatherings of more than 10 people including both overnight guests and visitors are not allowed and may be subject to eviction.Extra guests and visitors are not permitted without management consentThe number of overnight guests cannot exceed the maximum occupancy."
Are the Hosteeva properties family-friendly?

Yes, most Hosteeva properties are family-friendly. Hosteeva offers a variety of accommodations that cater to families, including properties with multiple bedrooms, spacious living areas, and amenities suitable for children of different ages.
Are the Hosteeva properties kid-friendly?
Yes, most Hosteeva properties are kid-friendly and suitable for children of different ages.
Are the Hosteeva properties professionally cleaned?

Yes, Hosteeva properties undergo thorough professional cleaning to uphold a superior level of cleanliness for all guests. Hosteeva places great importance on cleanliness and hygiene, striving to create a pleasant and hygienic atmosphere that ensures guest comfort.
Are there any accessibility features for guests with disabilities?

Hosteeva strives to provide accessible accommodations for guests with disabilities, but the availability of specific accessibility features may vary depending on the property and location.To find Hosteeva properties with specific accessibility features, you can use the filters on www.hosteeva.com/travel
Are there any age restrictions for renting Hosteeva properties?

Yes, there are age restrictions for renting Hosteeva properties. The specific age requirements can vary depending on the property and the policies set by the property owner or management. These restrictions are typically in place to ensure compliance with local laws and regulations and to maintain a safe and responsible environment for all guests.In many cases, the minimum age requirement for renting a Hosteeva property is 18 years old. However, some properties may have higher age restrictions, such as 21 years old or even 25 years old. The age requirement may also vary based on the type of property, location, and other factors.To find out the age restrictions for a specific Hosteeva property, you can refer to the property listing on the Hosteeva website or contact Hosteeva directly. The age restrictions will typically be stated in the property description or terms and conditions.If you are below the minimum age requirement, it's best to explore other accommodation options or consider involving an adult who meets the age requirement to make the reservation on your behalf.It's important to adhere to the age restrictions set by Hosteeva to ensure a smooth booking process and a comfortable stay. Violation of age restrictions may result in cancellation of the reservation or denial of entry to the property.
Are there any noise restrictions or quiet hours in place at the properties?

Yes, Hosteeva properties typically have noise restrictions or quiet hours in place to ensure a peaceful and respectful environment for all guests. These restrictions aim to promote a comfortable stay for guests and maintain good relations with neighbors and the local community.Quiet hours may vary depending on the property and its location, but they generally occur during nighttime hours to minimize disturbance to other guests and residents. During quiet hours, guests are expected to keep noise levels to a minimum and refrain from activities that could cause excessive noise or disrupt the tranquility of the property.It's important to review the property's rules and guidelines regarding noise restrictions, including any designated quiet hours, when booking a Hosteeva property. The property listing or terms and conditions should provide information about any specific noise policies or quiet hours that guests are required to observe.Adhering to the noise restrictions and quiet hours helps create a harmonious environment and ensures a positive experience for all guests. It also helps maintain a good relationship between the property and its neighbors or the surrounding community.If you have any specific questions or concerns regarding noise restrictions or quiet hours at a Hosteeva property, it's best to contact Hosteeva directly for accurate and up-to-date information. They can provide you with any specific guidelines or policies in place for the property you are interested in and address any inquiries you may have.
Are there any restrictions on smoking in the Hosteeva properties?

Yes, all Hosteeva properties are non-smoking. If you are a smoker, it's important to carefully review the smoking policy before making a reservation to ensure it aligns with your preferences and needs. If smoking is not permitted on the property, it is crucial to respect the policy and refrain from smoking inside the property or in any non-designated areas.Failure to comply with the smoking policy may result in penalties, additional cleaning fees,
Are there any restrictions on the number of guests allowed in the properties?

Yes, there are restrictions on the number of guests allowed in the properties rented through Hosteeva. These restrictions are in place to ensure the safety, comfort, and compliance with local regulations of the property.Each property managed by Hosteeva will have a maximum occupancy limit specified by the property owner or management. This limit is typically based on the number of bedrooms, available bedding, and the property's overall capacity.It's crucial to adhere to the specified maximum occupancy limit to avoid any issues during your 4stay. Exceeding the maximum occupancy can lead to violations of fire codes, disturbance to neighbors, or other safety concerns.If you have a larger group and require multiple accommodations, Hosteeva can assist you in finding properties that can accommodate your entire group while staying within the maximum occupancy guidelines.
Can I bring pets to the Hosteeva properties?

Some Hosteeva properties are pet-friendly, allowing guests to bring their pets, while others have restrictions or not permit pets at all.To determine if a particular property allows pets, you can check the property listing on the Hosteeva website or contact Hosteeva directly. Property listings often specify whether pets are allowed and may provide additional information about any specific pet restrictions, such as size limitations or breed restrictions.It's important to note that if pets are allowed, there will be additional fees
Can I check in early?
Early check-in is a matter of availability and can be granted 24 hours prior to arrival. You will get an offer via email or text if it's possible for extra charge
Can I check out late?
Late checkout is a matter of availability and can be granted 24 hours prior to your departure. You will get an offer via email or text if it's possible for extra charge.
Can I get a refund if I need to cancel my reservation?

The refund policy for Hosteeva reservations can vary depending on several factors, including the specific property, the terms and conditions of your reservation, and the timing of your cancellation. It's essential to review the cancellation policy provided at the time of booking to understand the refund options available to you.
Can I modify my reservation after it has been confirmed?

Yes, in most cases, you can modify your reservation with Hosteeva after it has been confirmed. However, the specific modification options and any associated fees or conditions will depend on the terms and conditions of your reservation, the property you booked, and the availability at the time of the modification request.To modify your reservation, you can contact Hosteeva via email at reservations@hosteeva.comIt's important to note that modification requests are subject to availability, and any changes to your reservation may result in adjustments to the total cost, including potential fees or rate differences. Hosteeva will provide you with the details of any applicable charges or adjustments before finalizing the modification.
Can I request a crib or high chair for my stay?

Crib and high chair requests are a matter of availability and should be requested prior to your stay.You can email the Hosteeva Customer Support Team at reservations@hosteeva.com to submit your request
Can I request a specific type of bed configuration in the property?

Yes, you can request a specific bed configuration for the property you book with Hosteeva. It's important to note that bed configurations may be subject to availability and can vary between properties. Some properties may offer flexible options for bed configurations, while others may have fixed bed setups that cannot be changed. By communicating your preferences in advance, Hosteeva can assist you in finding a property that meets your specific requirements
Can I request an early check-in or late check-out?

Both early check-in and late checkout requests are a matter of availability and can be granted 24 hours prior to arrival.You will get an offer via email or text if any of these options are possible at an extra charge
Can I request housekeeping services during my stay?

Yes, you can request housekeeping services during your stay at Hosteeva properties. You will be required to pay extra. To request housekeeping services, you need to contact the Hosteeva customer support team.
Do you provide daily housekeeping?
Yes, we do. For an additional fee, daily housekeeping services are available upon your request.
Does Hosteeva offer any airport transportation or shuttle services?

Unfortunately, we do not, but alternatively, you can explore other transportation options such as taxis, rideshare services, or public transportation to travel to and from the airport. Hosteeva can often provide guidance or suggestions on the most convenient transportation methods in the area.
Does Hosteeva offer any discounted rates for long-term stays?

Yes, Hosteeva offers discounted rates for long-term stays. The discount percentage depends on specific property, location and dates. All discounted properties will display the discount amount before you finalize your booking on www.hosteeva.com/travel
Does Hosteeva offer any loyalty or rewards program for frequent guests?
At the moment, Hosteeva does not offer a loyalty or rewards program. However, as a returning guest, you can still enjoy up to 15% discount on your bookings.
Does Hosteeva offer travel insurance for bookings?
Hosteeva has partnered with Generali, a leading global provider of insurance to offer travel insurance for all bookings made through the hosteeva.com website.
How can I book a property through Hosteeva?

"Visit the Hosteeva website: Go to the official Hosteeva website (www.hosteeva.com) using a web browser on your computer or mobile device.Enter your destination and travel dates: Use the search bar on the homepage to enter your desired destination and the dates of your stay. You can also specify the number of guests and the number of rooms you require.Browse available properties: Hosteeva will display a list of available properties that match your search criteria. You can use filters and sorting options to narrow down the search results based on your preferences, such as property type, amenities, price range, and more.Select a property: Review the property listings, including descriptions, photos, amenities, and guest reviews. Once you find a property that suits your needs and preferences, click on it for more details.Check availability and pricing: On the property page, you will see the availability calendar, indicating which dates are available for booking. Select your desired dates to check the cancellation policy.Provide guest information: Enter the required guest information, including your name, contact details, and any special requests or comments you may have.Complete the booking: Proceed to the payment section to finalize your booking. Hosteeva accepts various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and online payment platforms. Follow the prompts to provide the necessary payment details and confirm your reservation.Confirmation and communication: After completing the booking, you will receive a confirmation email with the details of your reservation, including check-in instructions and contact information. Hosteeva may also provide a portal or login where you can manage your reservation.It's important to note that the exact booking process may vary slightly depending on the specific property and any additional services or requirements. If you have any questions or encounter any issues during the booking process, Hosteeva's customer support team is available to assist you.
How do I check in?

Hi! Thank you for booking with us! You will receive detailed check-in instructions to your provided email and phone number 24-48 hours prior to check-in. Please, feel free to contact us in case any further assistance is needed.
How do I provide feedback or review my experience with Hosteeva?

After your stay at a Hosteeva property, you will receive an email or text notification requesting you to provide a review or feedback. This message usually contains a link or instructions on how to proceed
How do I request daily housekeeping?

To submit your daily housekeeping request, you need to either reach out to Hosteeva Customer Support at 650-735-0080 or send your request to reservations@hosteeva.com. Please note daily housekeeping services will be subject to an additional fee.I was attempting to checkout using affirm but it's stuck on the checkout page so i'm not sure if the reservation went through.Hi! Please, contact Hosteeva 24/7 Customer Support at +1 650-735-0080 to get more details on your reservation.I'm being asked to upload a drivers license but I don’t have one. Only state issued IDHi, no worries!! Please, feel free to upload your State Identification card in case you do not have a Driver's License. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know.
Is parking available at the Hosteeva properties?

Yes, parking is typically available at Hosteeva properties. Most Hosteeva properties provide parking facilities, either on-site or in nearby designated parking areas.The specific parking arrangements can vary depending on the property and its location. Some properties may have private parking spaces or dedicated parking lots, while others may offer street parking or shared parking areas within a building or complex.When searching for Hosteeva properties or reviewing a specific property listing, you can usually find information about parking in the amenities or property details section. It may specify whether parking is available, the type of parking (e.g., on-site, off-site, garage), and any additional details or instructions regarding parking arrangements.If you have specific parking requirements or concerns, such as the need for a specific number of parking spaces or if you have oversized vehicles, it's recommended to contact Hosteeva directly or reach out to their customer support team. They will be able to provide you with accurate information regarding parking availability and address any specific inquiries you may have.It's important to note that some properties may have limited parking spaces, and additional fees or permits may be required for parking. It's advisable to review the parking details provided by Hosteeva and adhere to any parking instructions or guidelines to ensure a smooth and hassle-free parking experience during your stay.
Is there a minimum stay requirement for Hosteeva properties?

Yes, there may be a minimum stay requirement for Hosteeva properties. The specific minimum stay requirement can vary depending on the property, location, and time of year. Some properties may have a minimum stay of 2 nights, while others may require a longer minimum stay, such as 3, 4, or 7 nights. There are properties with 28 days min. stay requirement.The minimum stay requirement is typically indicated in the property listing and will be visible during the booking process. When searching for properties on the Hosteeva website or other booking platforms, you can usually filter or sort the listings based on minimum stay requirements to find properties that meet your desired length of stay.It's important to be aware of the minimum stay requirement before making a reservation, as it ensures that the property owner can accommodate bookings that meet their specific criteria. If you have flexibility in your travel dates, you may have more options to choose from, including properties with shorter minimum stay requirements.If you have specific requirements or need assistance in finding a property that meets your desired length of stay, it is recommended to contact Hosteeva directly or reach out to their customer support team. They will be able to provide you with accurate information on the minimum stay requirements for the properties you are interested in and assist you in finding the best option for your travel needs.Please connect me with a live person.Hi! Got it! Please, contact Hosteeva 24/7 Customer Support at +1 650-735-0080. They will be able to address your questions and concerns.
What amenities are included in the Hosteeva properties?

Hosteeva properties offer a range of amenities to provide guests with a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The specific amenities provided can vary from property to property, but here are some common amenities you can expect to find in many Hosteeva properties:Fully Equipped Kitchen: Most Hosteeva properties feature a fully equipped kitchen with appliances, cookware, and utensils, allowing guests to prepare their own meals.Wi-Fi: Wi-Fi connectivity is typically available in Hosteeva properties, enabling guests to stay connected and access the internet during their stay.Linens and Towels: Bed linens, pillows, and bath towels are generally provided in Hosteeva properties, ensuring a comfortable and convenient stay.Toiletries: Basic toiletries such as soap, shampoo, and toilet paper are often supplied for guests' convenience.TV and Entertainment: Many Hosteeva properties are equipped with televisions and entertainment systems, offering a variety of channels or streaming services for guests to enjoy.Heating and Air Conditioning: Hosteeva properties typically have heating and air conditioning systems to provide a comfortable indoor environment regardless of the season.Washer and Dryer: Some properties may include a washer and dryer or access to shared laundry facilities, allowing guests to conveniently do laundry during their stay.Swimming Pool or Hot Tub: Depending on the property, guests may have access to a swimming pool or a hot tub for relaxation and recreation.Parking: Many Hosteeva properties provide parking facilities, either on-site or nearby, for guests' convenience.Outdoor Spaces: Some properties may feature outdoor spaces such as balconies, patios, or gardens, allowing guests to enjoy fresh air and outdoor activities.Fitness Facilities: Certain properties may offer access to fitness centers, gyms, or exercise equipment for guests who wish to maintain their fitness routine during their stay.24/7 Customer Support: Hosteeva typically offers 24/7 customer support to assist guests with any inquiries, concerns, or emergencies that may arise during their stay.It's important to note that while many amenities are commonly provided, the specific amenities available in a particular property may vary. It is recommended to review the property listing or contact Hosteeva directly for detailed information on the amenities included in a specific property of interest.
What is Hosteeva?

We are a team of adventurers and bucket listers who turned our passion into business.As avid travelers who have visited every continent in the world, we love to experience places and destinations the way locals do. And having seen the best (and the worst) local stay has to offer, in 2014 we have been inspired by the idea to provide our family, friends and now you with the most unique and affordable vacation rentals possible.9 years, 321,000 booked nights and a customer satisfaction rate of 4.7 stars, our promise to you is to deliver on the type of vacation stay that we want to experience ourselves.
What is the cancellation policy for Hosteeva bookings?

The cancellation policy for Hosteeva bookings can vary depending on several factors, including the specific property, the terms and conditions of your reservation, and the timing of your cancellation. It's important to review the cancellation policy provided at the time of booking to understand the specific terms and conditions that apply to your reservation.
What is the check-in and check-out time for Hosteeva properties?

The check-in and check-out times for Hosteeva properties may vary depending on the specific property and its policies. Generally, the standard check-in time is in the afternoon, typically around 3:00 PM or 4:00 PM, and the check-out time is in the morning, typically around 10:00 AM or 11:00 AM.It's important to note that these times are common guidelines, and the exact check-in and check-out times for a specific property will be communicated to guests during the booking process and provided in the reservation details.Additionally, some Hosteeva properties may offer flexibility in check-in and check-out times or provide options for early check-in or late check-out based on availability and prior arrangements. This can be particularly helpful for guests with specific travel schedules or if they require additional time for their stay.
What items are provided in a Hosteeva property?

All Hosteeva properties are fully stocked to ensure you have the comforts of home during your stay. This includes toiletries, fresh towels, tea, coffee, and kitchen essentials. We also provide a limited number of dishwasher and laundry pods.Below are the full breakdown of the items that we provide one time only as a courtesy upon arrival. (These items will not be replenished during your stay) Most properties have a washer and dryer, so you can launder items during your stay if needed.● Towels● Bed linen● Trash bags● Toilet paper● Dish soap● Shampoo & Conditioner● 2 laundry detergent pods● 2 dishwasher pods
What parking options are available?

Parking options will vary depending on your Hosteeva home.If you need parking during your stay, you can filter for Hosteeva homes that have parking available on our website or the app.Once booked, your parking options will be included in your booking confirmation and check-in instructions.
What payment methods does Hosteeva accept?
Hosteeva accepts major credit cards, such as Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, Diners Club and Discover. There is a payment option with Affirm as well
What types of accommodations does Hosteeva offer?

"Vacation Rentals: Hosteeva provides vacation rental properties, including houses, villas, cottages, and cabins, ideal for family vacations or group getaways.Apartments: Hosteeva offers a selection of apartments in different sizes and configurations, ranging from studios to multiple-bedroom units, suitable for solo travelers, couples, or small groups.Condos: Hosteeva features condos in popular destinations, providing comfortable and convenient stays for travelers looking for a home-like experience.Townhouses: Hosteeva presents townhouse rentals, combining the space and privacy of a house with the amenities and convenience of a condominium.Luxury Accommodations: For those seeking a more upscale experience, Hosteeva offers luxurious accommodations, such as high-end condos, penthouses, or upscale villas with premium amenities and exclusive features.Beachfront Properties: Hosteeva has a selection of beachfront properties, allowing guests to enjoy stunning ocean views, direct beach access, and proximity to waterfront activities.Ski Chalets: Hosteeva provides ski chalets in popular ski destinations, offering cozy accommodations near the slopes and winter recreational activities.Corporate Housing: Hosteeva offers corporate housing options for business travelers, providing fully furnished apartments or condos with amenities and services suitable for longer stays.Extended Stay Rentals: For guests looking for an extended stay, Hosteeva offers accommodations with flexible lease options, allowing for comfortable and convenient long-term stays.Unique and Specialty Accommodations: Hosteeva also features unique and specialty accommodations, such as historic homes, themed properties, or eco-friendly retreats, catering to travelers seeking a distinctive experience.These accommodations are available in various locations, including popular tourist destinations, cities, coastal areas, mountain resorts, and more, allowing guests to choose their preferred destination and property type based on their travel preferences."
When Hosteeva was founded?
Hosteeva was founded in 2014.
Where are Hosteeva properties located?

"Hosteeva properties are located in a variety of destinations, including popular tourist destinations, cities, coastal areas, and mountain resorts. The specific locations where Hosteeva properties can be found may vary over time as new properties are added and availability changes. Some examples of common locations where Hosteeva properties are available include:Beach Destinations: Hosteeva offers properties in coastal areas known for their beautiful beaches, such as Miami Beach, Myrtle Beach, Destin, Gulf Shores, and Panama City Beach.Urban Centers: Hosteeva properties can be found in vibrant city centers, including New York City, Los Angeles, Miami, Chicago, San Francisco, and Las Vegas.Mountain Resorts: Hosteeva offers accommodations near popular mountain resorts, such as Aspen, Vail, Breckenridge, Park City, Lake Tahoe, and Whistler.Tourist Hotspots: Hosteeva properties are available in well-known tourist destinations like Orlando (near Walt Disney World and Universal Studios), Nashville, New Orleans. Cultural and Historic Cities: Hosteeva properties can be found in cities rich in history and culture, such as Boston, Charleston, Savannah, New Orleans, and Washington, D.C.International Locations: Hosteeva also offers properties in international destinations, including popular cities like Paris, London, Barcelona, and Rome.Please note that the availability of properties in specific locations may vary, and it is recommended to visit the Hosteeva website or contact their customer service for the most up-to-date information on available locations."
Where is Hosteeva located?
The address of the main office is 189 Maple Ridge Dr, Metairie, LA 70001
Why is Eva?
That's how I was named?
Why is the system taking so long for me to sign in?

I am sorry to hear that you are experiencing delay while trying to sign in. Our system may be experiencing some technical difficulties at the moment, but please do not worry as we are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, please contact Hosteeva Customer Support team at +1 650-735-0080 and they will gladly address all your questions and concerns. Thank you for your patience and understanding.You are not helpful.I'm sorry if I didn't meet your expectations. Please provide more details about the issue so I can assist you better. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we appreciate your feedback. Let me know how I can help further. Thank youGeneral Information
Are there any local events or festivals happening during my stay?
Please follow this link to know more about ongoing events and festivals https://www.neworleans.com/events/
Are there any nearby laundry or dry-cleaning services?
There is both a washer and a dryer in the unit which you can use.
Are there any popular tourist attractions or family-friendly activities in the area?

Here are a few options:Audubon Butterfly Garden and Insectarium: Located just a few blocks away from Baronne Street, the Audubon Butterfly Garden and Insectarium is a popular destination for families. The museum features exhibits on insects and other arthropods, including live butterfly and insect exhibits.National World War II Museum: The National World War II Museum is located just a short distance from Baronne Street and is a must-visit attraction for history buffs and families alike. The museum features a variety of exhibits and interactive experiences, including a 4D cinematic experience.Jackson Square: Jackson Square is a historic park located in the heart of the French Quarter, just a few blocks away from Baronne Street. The park is surrounded by historic buildings and features street performers, artists, and musicians.Steamboat Natchez: The Steamboat Natchez is a classic steamboat that offers tours of the Mississippi River. The boat departs from the nearby French Quarter and offers a variety of tours, including jazz brunch and dinner cruises.
Are there any promotions or discounts for future stays?
We will make sure to provide you with the best offer for your future stay!
Can I get a breakdown of the charges on my invoice or receipt?
Sure! Please, address your request to us, and the proper documentation will be provided
Can I get a copy of my invoice or receipt?
Sure! Please, address your request to us, and the proper documentation will be provided
Can I get a refund for any unused services or amenities?
Actually, the taxes and fees listed, which have no "refundable" specification are non-refundable.
Can I recommend this rental to a friend or family member?
We will be glad to accommodate You anytime! Please, check our website to find the best price and location for your stay and we will be happy to offer you the best price!
Can I request additional cleaning services?
For an additional fee, daily housekeeping services are available upon your request
Can you help me book a taxi or arrange a car rental?
Unfortunately I cannot.
Can you help me make reservations at a specific restaurant or venue?
Unfortunately I cannot.
Can you provide information about nearby medical or dental clinics, pharmacies, or places of worship?

Medical and Dental Clinics:Urgent Care Eleven: This walk-in clinic is located at 1100 Poydras St, Suite 100, just a few blocks from 808 Baronne Street. They offer a range of medical services, including urgent care, occupational health, and travel medicine. Pharmacies:Walgreens: This pharmacy is located at 900 Canal St, just a few blocks from 808 Baronne Street.CVS Pharmacy: This pharmacy is located at 800 Canal St, just a few blocks from 808 Baronne Street. Places of Worship:St. Patrick's Church: This Catholic church is located at 724 Camp St, just a few blocks from 808 Baronne Street.
Can you provide instructions for using the appliances?
All the instructions are provided in the check-in instructions. Please, contact +1 650 735 0080 in case additional questions arise
Can you recommend any local cooking classes, workshops, or guided tours?

New Orleans School of Cooking: The New Orleans School of Cooking is located just a few blocks away from 808 Baronne Street, at the intersection of St. Louis Street and Chartres Street in the French Quarter. They offer daily cooking classes that focus on traditional New Orleans cuisine, such as gumbo, jambalaya, and pralines.Southern Food and Beverage Museum: The Southern Food and Beverage Museum is located a short distance from 808 Baronne Street, at the intersection of Oretha Castle Haley Boulevard and Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard. They offer cooking classes, workshops, and events that celebrate the food and drink of the American South.Confederacy of Cruisers Bike Tours: Confederacy of Cruisers is a bike tour company that offers a variety of guided tours of New Orleans, including a culinary bike tour that explores the city's food culture. They also offer tours focused on cocktails, history, and music.Destination Kitchen: Destination Kitchen is a company that offers cooking classes and culinary tours in New Orleans. They offer a variety of experiences, including cooking classes focused on Cajun and Creole cuisine, as well as walking tours of the French Quarter and other neighborhoods.Cajun Cooking Experience: The Cajun Cooking Experience is located a short distance from 808 Baronne Street, in the neighborhood of Mid-City. They offer cooking classes that focus on the cuisine of the Cajun and Creole cultures, as well as guided tours of local markets and farms.
Can you recommend any nearby theaters, live performances, or nightlife options such as bars or clubs?
Please follow this link to know more about ongoing events and festivals https://www.neworleans.com/events/
Can you recommend nearby restaurants, attractions, and shopping centers?

Absolutely! Here you goRestaurants:Commander's Palace - This iconic restaurant is just a few blocks away from Baronne Street and is known for its Creole cuisine and elegant ambiance.Cochon - Located in the nearby Warehouse District, Cochon serves up traditional Cajun and Southern dishes with a contemporary twist.Mother's - A New Orleans institution, Mother's is famous for its po'boys and other classic Creole dishes.Attractions:St. Louis Cathedral - This historic Catholic cathedral is located in Jackson Square and is one of the most recognizable landmarks in New Orleans.The Cabildo - Located next to St. Louis Cathedral, the Cabildo is a historic building that houses a museum with exhibits on Louisiana history and culture.The National WWII Museum - Just a few blocks away from Baronne Street, this museum is a must-visit for history buffs and features exhibits on the American experience during World War II.Shopping Centers:The Outlet Collection at Riverwalk - Located just a short distance from Baronne Street, the Riverwalk is a large indoor shopping mall that features a variety of stores, including outlets for major brands.The Shops at Canal Place - Located in the nearby French Quarter, this upscale shopping center features high-end retailers such as Saks Fifth Avenue and Tiffany & Co.Magazine Street - A few blocks away from Baronne Street, Magazine Street is a popular shopping destination with a variety of boutique shops, art galleries, and restaurants.
Can you suggest any local wine or food tastings?

Certainly! Here you go:1. The Tasting Room: Located just a short distance from Baronne Street, The Tasting Room is a wine bar and shop that offers a wide selection of wines from all over the world. They also offer a variety of small plates and charcuterie boards to pair with your wine. They often host tasting events where you can try a selection of wines and learn about their origins and tasting notes.2. Emeril's Delmonico: Chef Emeril Lagasse's Delmonico restaurant is just a few blocks away from Baronne Street and is known for its contemporary Creole cuisine. They offer a chef's tasting menu with wine pairings, featuring dishes such as grilled duck breast and blackened redfish. Their wine list features both domestic and international wines, with a focus on those from California and France.
Do you have a discount for repeat guests?
Yes, all repeat guests are eligible for a 15% discount
Do you provide daily housekeeping?
Yes, for an additional fee, daily housekeeping services are available upon your request
How can I arrange transportation to/from the airport?

We do not provide those services, just let me hint you: Taxi: Taxis are readily available at the airport, and the ride to Baronne Street typically takes around 20-30 minutes. The taxi stand is located outside of baggage claim on the first level of the airport.Ride-sharing services: Uber and Lyft both operate in New Orleans and can be accessed from the airport. The pick-up area for ride-sharing services is located on the third level of the airport parking garage.Airport Shuttle: Several airport shuttle services operate in New Orleans, including Airport Shuttle New Orleans and Airport Shuttle Inc. These shuttle services typically provide door-to-door transportation to hotels in the city, including those located on Baronne Street.Public Transit: The New Orleans Regional Transit Authority (RTA) operates several bus routes that connect the airport to downtown New Orleans, including the 202 Airport Express bus. The bus stop is located on the second level of the airport.Car Rental: Several car rental companies operate at the airport, including Avis, Budget, Enterprise, and Hertz. You can rent a car and drive to Baronne Street, which typically takes around 20-30 minutes.
How can I contact the property owner or manager if I have further questions?
Got a question? Call/Text +1 650 735 0080 anytime to contact our local manager.
How can I find information about local weather conditions and forecasts?

The National Weather Service provides detailed weather information and forecasts for New Orleans on their website at www.weather.gov. You can also sign up for email or text alerts for severe weather and other important weather-related information.
How can I get tickets to local shows, concerts, or sporting events?
Please follow this link to know more about ongoing events and festivals https://www.neworleans.com/events/
How can I provide feedback or leave a review for my stay?
All guests receive survey's duyring their stay, and you are always welcome to leave your feedback at guestrelations@hosteeva.com
How can I report a problem with the check-out process or offer suggestions for improvement?
Please, email us at reservations@hosteeva.com for any issue during the stay or call/text us at +1 650 735 0080. You will receive a survey link where you can leave your feedback and suggestions
How do I access the laundry facilities?
There is both a washer and a dryer in the unit which you can use.
How do I adjust the water temperature in the shower or bath?
There can be many reasons for such kind of problems. Please, contact +1 650 735 0080 to have them solved.
How do I report any issues with pests or cleanliness in the rental?
Please, contact +1 650 735 0080 to have them solved. Also, please, send the pictures via email at reservatios@hosteeva.com or text to +1 650 735 0080.
Is the rental suitable for children, elderly guests, or guests with disabilities?
I would like to inform you that children are always welcome! Concerning accessibility, the property is not wheelchair inaccessible and it has must climb stairs.
What is the policy for addressing unresolved issues or concerns?
Please, call/text at +1 650 735 0080 anytime to get help!
When can I receive my refundable damage deposit?
A refundable damage deposit is released 72 hours after the checkout if no damage is reported. It usually takes 5-7 business days to be credited back to your account
When will I receive my security deposit refund?
In case we put the Refundable Damage Deposit on hold for your reservation, it will be released 72 hours after the check-out, once the unit is checked.
Where can I find nearby public transportation stops or stations?

There are several bus stops located near 808 Baronne Street, including stops for the 11 Magazine, 27 Louisiana, and 28 M.L. King Jr. bus routes. These bus routes connect to several neighborhoods and destinations in the city.
Why doesn't the TV have a signal/Internet connection?

Please, make sure the TV is properly plugged in. Try checking all inputs and make sure the satellite/cable options are ON. Also, try unplugging the TV for 30 seconds and then plug it back in. If you still face issues, please, call/text us at +1 650 735 0080.
Why is there no hot water in the system?
There can be many reasons for such kind of problems. Please, contact +1 650 735 0080 to have them solved.
Why is there no water in the kitchen?
There can be many reasons for such kind of problems. Please, contact +1 650 735 0080 to have them solved.
Will I receive a survey or questionnaire to provide feedback about my stay?
All guests receive survey's during their stay, and you are always welcome to leave your feedback at guestrelations@hosteeva.comCheck-in experience
Can I arrange for an early check-in?
Please, contact us on the day of your check-in, and we will check!
How can I get the building/unit door code?

The building/unit door code is included in the check-in instructions, which will be sent one day prior to the arrival date both to the email address and phone number we have on file as contact information
How do I check-in early?
Early check-in is a matter of availability. In case early check-in is possible, we will send a special paid early check-in offer to your email and phone
How do I check-in?
You will get a detailed check-in instructions to your provided email and phone number 24-48 hours prior to check-in
How do I lock and unlock the doors or windows?

To unlock the door:- Find the black keypad located on the left side of the entrance door- Key in the door room code numbers provided above, and press the red button located under the numbers- It's that simple!To lock the door:- Close the door- Press the red button on the keypad.
How do I lock/unlock my unit door?

To unlock the door, please enter the code and rotate the deadbolt away from the hinges. If the lock is located on the left side of the door, the deadbolt needs to be rotated to the right.To lock the door, please rotate the deadbolt towards the hinges. If the lock is located on the left side of the door, the deadbolt needs to be rotated to the left. Please note: the door is not locking automatically, and the deadbolt needs to be rotated to lock the door.How do I open the door? the code is green but the door would not openYou need to make sure that you are rotating the deadbolt after entering the code
If the main guest is not to check in, how do the others get access to the unit?
The main guest needs to share the check-in information that he was provided with with the guest's who are first to check-in
Is late check-out available?
Late checkout is a matter of availability. In case late checkout is available we will send a special paid late checkout offer to your email and phone number
Should the guest use 2* that is in the code?
Yes, the guests need to use 2*
What is the check-in/check-out process?
You will receive the detailed check-in instructions 24 hours prior to your check-in, via email/text. The check-out instructions will be sent the day prior to your check-out via email/text.
Where can I see my check-in instructions?
Your check-in instructions can be found in your email and text messages.
Why isn't the given door code working?
Please, make sure: You are at the correct location, the date and the time are correct, you enter all the digits and symbols of the code provided. Otherwise, please, contact us at +1 650 735 0080
Why my door code does not work?
Please make sure you are in front of correct unit. The door code will work only on the day of your check-in on and after scheduled check-in time.
Will the early check-in code work for the whole stay?
Yes the code is going to work from the moment it is created till the departure date.Amenity related information
Can I leave my luggage in the lobby before my check-in?
We have a luggage storage facility in the building, next to the main elevator, the residents can use it before check-in or after check-out.
Do all the properties have windows in the bedrooms?
No, not all units in the building have a window in the bedroom as well. You can check that information before booking with the property management as well.
Do you provide an air mattress?
No, we do not.
How do I connect TV to Wifi?

If the TV does not connect to the WIFI, please go Settings/Connections, and try to connect it. If the TV cannot find the network during that process, please unplug the TV for a minute and try it again or try to "forget the network" and then enter the WiFi password again.If the problem is not solved after all these steps, you can feel free to contact our customer support.
Is there a recycling facility in the building?
There is no recycling facility in the building.
What are the parking options, and can I request a parking location?
"Two cars can park in the garage- One car has to pull in to the left and then another car pulls in to the right- The car on the right has to exit first in order for the car on the left to exit"
What do I do if the TV remote is broken or there are no batteries?

Please, address your issue to us, attaching the pictures of the broken/missing item.
